name: Goat Scourge
description:
Quiet village life is disturbed by the attack of the Ogre Sorcerer, who needs goat bones for his magical experiments. The beloved pet goat of a village boy is stolen - and he risks it all to save the goat's life. Help him retrieve his pet - and explore the village and its outskirts in our game.

The game contains several scenes in which the main character solves quests, explores the level with platformer mechanics, and confronts NPCs. The main goal of the character is to overcome all the obstacles, and save the goat. He will face the antagonist, whose aim is to collect the artefacts for his magic potion.
You will have a chance to play for both of them.

The entire game is quite short: you will jump on an adventure and will be done in less than an hour. But what an hour it will be!

This game was made with MANU Video Game Maker - no-code game engine!

Controls:
Movement - WASD;
Jump - Space;
Interact - E;
Interface buttons - 1-5;
Menu Interaction - Enter;
Attack/Chop - LAlt;
Goat Minigame - 1-3;
Quest Open/close - Q
